secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The human struggle to maintain faith amidst tragedy (Alabama tornado/personal grief).
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Preacher / The Hearer
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The human struggle (Secondary) is resolved only when the Divine Word (Primary) acts upon the subject.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon emphasizes the inability of the human subject to believe by their own power, necessitating a divine endowment of 'Pouvoir' (Power) through the Word.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from S2 (Death/Tornado) through ~S1 (Self-projection/Jesus Seminar) to S1 (The Word of the Risen Christ).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by the 'Who' (Christ) rather than the 'Why'.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; death and suffering are presented as insurmountable by human effort.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. It identifies the human as a passive receiver of faith which is 'created' by the external Word of God.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: We can choose a god who suits us

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: The Word of Jesus can create faith where there is no faith.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Thomas is not an example to follow, but a representative of the human condition who receives grace.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Thomas is the Receiver of Christ's self-revelation.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the burden of self-generated faith.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The sermon perfectly integrates the struggle of the hearer with the narrative of Thomas and the theological necessity of revelation.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: raised triumphant from the dead never to die again

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: Endowment (The Word creates the capacity to believe).

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Severe; 'still in your sins' without the Resurrection.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon maintains God as the Subject of the primary narrative program.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: The emphasis on God's power to create faith is the sermon's greatest strength.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in grace-oriented homiletics that refuses to turn the hearer into the hero of their own salvation.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis might focus on the use of the 'Jesus Seminar' as a foil, Greimasian analysis reveals that the Seminar functions as a semiotic 'Opponent' to the 'Sender' (Revelation).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the Thomas text; this analysis shows how the sermon *replicates* the actantial structure of the Gospel of John.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'Inner Voice' is a false 'Sender' that lacks the 'Pouvoir' to overcome the 'Opponent' (Death).

appendices.notities: The sermon successfully avoids the 'Exemplarism' trap by making the Word the active agent of faith rather than Thomas's willpower.
